Commands.Kick: Melee BRV attack + HP attack  Deals 40% HP damage to non-targets
Commands.Kick+: BRV × 1.3 + powerful melee BRV attack + HP attack.  Deals 40% HP damage to non-targets
Commands.Focus: Self: 3 turns ATK Up I, MAX BRV Up I  Kick becomes Kick+ for 3 turns after use

Passives.Critical Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with critical hits.
Passives.Kick Light: Slightly reduces Action Delay after using Kick.
Passives.Focus Light: Slightly reduces Action Delay after using Focus.
Passives.Kick Charge: Increases the max uses of Kick by 1.
Passives.Focus Charge: Increases the max uses of Focus by 1.
Passives.Kill BRV Gain: Grants a small amount of BRV after killing an enemy.
Passives.Fabul's Secret Teachings: Grants a low probability of countering BRV attacks.

Weapons.Dragon Claw CP: 15: Increases Kick's potency and raises HP damage inflicted to non-focused targets.
Weapons.Cat Claw CP: 35: Increases the max uses of Focus by 1 and lowers its Action Delay.Raises BRV based on Attack.Increases the potency of Attack Up and Max BRV Up and extends their duration.Turns BRV Attack to Kick Attacks for 5 turns after using Focus.
